patterns: Tell me about VNRVJIET
Give me information about VNRVJIET
responses: Vallurupalli Nageswara Rao Vignana Jyothi Institute of Engineering and Technology (VNRVJIET) is an engineering college in Hyderabad, India recognized by All India Council for Technical Education(AICTE) and affiliated to the Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Hyderabad.

patterns: What are different clubs in college?
what are extra-circular activities in college?
responses: There are 9 clubs 1)STENTORIAN - ENGLISH LITERATURE CLUB 2) VIGNANA JYOTHI SAHITIVANAM - TELUGU LITERATURE CLUB ;3)VJ THEATRO ; 4) DRAMATRIX;5)SCINTILLATE -PHOTOGRAPHY;6)CREATIVE ARTS - ARTS CLUB; 7)LIWE WIRE- DANCE CLUB ; 8) NSS - SOCIAL SERVICE CLUB ; 9)CRESCENDO- MUSIC CLUB
There are total 9 extra circular activities clubs in VNRVJIET and many more co circular clubs.

patterns: What are the different departments in VNRVJIET?
responses: There are 9 Departments in VNRVJIET 1)IT 2)CIVIL 3)EEE 4)MECHANICAL 5)ECE 6)CSE 7)EIE 8)AE 9)HUMANITY AND SCIENCES

patterns: what is the admission process at vnrvjiet?
How can I get into VNRVJIET?
responses: A Student at vnr can be admitted in 3 ways 1)A-cat(eamcet,spot admissions) 2)B-cat(jee main) 3)Nri(12th marks).Last year cutoff ranks are provided for reference http://www.vnrvjiet.ac.in/download/admissions/FIRST_LAST_EAMCET_2019_RANKS.pdf

patterns: Minimum,average and maximum packages provided at VNRVJIET
responses: Our college, VNRVJIET has best placements every year.The top salary package offered is 40 LPA, Average package offered is 4LPA and the minimum package offered is 3.25 LPA

patterns: What is the difference between CSE AND IT?
responses: Computer Science Engineering deals with the design and development of computer components, whereas, Information Technology is the branch of Engineering that deals with the application of computers in businesses

patterns: What is the difference between AI,ML and Data science?
responses: Data science involves analysis, visualization, and prediction; it uses different statistical techniques. AI uses logic and decision trees; it makes use of models that make machines act like humans.It means the computer, in one way or another, imitates human behavior. ML is a branch of AI

patterns: What are the certification courses offered for IT and CSE students at VNRVJIET?
responses: Python Programming,Machine Learning using R/Python,Cloud Computing (Microsft Azure / AWS),Data science,Cyber Security,Being Zero,Servicenow,Oracle Certified Associate (OCA),Blockchain Technologies,Big Data Analytics – R Prpgramming,Internet Of Things(IoT)

patterns: What are the certification courses offered for ECE students at VNRVJIET?
responses: Embedded Linux Application Development Program ,Design of Digital Circuits Using Verilog.,Design and Development in Lab VIEW,ASIC Design using industry standard EDA tools,Networking,VLSI Design Flow using CAD Tools,VLSI frontend design tools,ASIC Design using industry standard EDA tools

patterns: What are the certification courses offered for CIVIL students at VNRVJIET
responses: Applications of Auto CAD in Civil Engineering,Total Station application in land surveying,ETABS,Project Management

patterns: What are the certification courses offered for AE students at VNRVJIET
responses: Catia Mechanical Specialist,Creo Parametric,Hyperworks,Ansys,Ansys-CFD,MATLAB,Python,Certificate Course on Programming

patterns: What are the certification courses offered for ME students at VNRVJIET
responses: Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD),JAVA Programming,ANSYS,Additive Manufacturing

patterns: What are the certification courses offered for EIE students at VNRVJIET
responses: PLC and SCADA Training ,National Instruments Certfied CLAD Training,MATLab,Robotics Design,VERILOG Digital Design,PCBI Design

patterns: Infrastructure of vnr?
responses: VNRVJIET Infrastructure/facilities includes :Library,Hostel,Sports Complex,Labs,Cafeteria,Gym,Hospital / Medical Facilities,Wi-Fi Campus,Shuttle Service,Auditorium

patterns: what is Convergence?
responses: The national level Technical Symposium under the banner “CONVERGENCE” has been instrumental in shifting the paradigm of usual coursework. Since its inception in 1999, it has evolved as an ultimate platform for the techno-maniacs.s. It brings in a series of events and activities spread over 3 days involving the students of myriad disciplines and hence broadening the horizons. Events, Workshops, Presentations, Seminars, and guest lectures were organized under each theme. Convergence is the annual technicalfest of VNRVJEIT

patterns: what is Sintillashunz?
responses: Sintillashunz , the annual cultural fest of VNRVJIET.It brings in a series of events and activities spread over 3 day 1)On the first day of the event, Cultural Day celebrations are conducted 2)On the second day of Sintillasunz-2018, Ethnic Day(Traditional Day) will be held and folowed by Tollywood Night in the evening 3)On the third day EDM Night is conducted. Along with this events people from different clubs like Live-wire,Dramatix,CRESCENDO also participate in the events

patterns: what types of food available at vnr?
what kind of food is available at vnr?
responses: we have different types of stalls like 1)fast food 2)bakery 3)soft drinks 4)Regular meals 5)coffee shop 6)cafeteria

patterns: Give me information about IT Department
Can I know about IT department?
What is the intake of IT Department?
When is IT department established?
responses: The department of Information Technology was established in the year 1997 with an annual intake of 60, increased to 180 in the year 2017.

patterns: Give me information about CIVIL Department
Can I know about Civil department?
What is the intake of Civil Department?
When is Civil department established?
responses: The Department of Civil Engineering was started in the year 2001 with an annual intake of 60 undergraduate students which was subsequently raised to the present annual intake of 120 students. It also offers three PG Courses in Structural Engineering, Geo-Technical Engineering and Highway Engineering.

patterns: Give me information about EEE Department
Can I know about EEE department?
What is the intake of EEE Department?
responses: The Department of Electrical & Electronics Engineering offers Undergraduate and Postgraduate programs in Electrical Engineering Discipline.The Department is recognized as a Research Centre in Electrical and Electronics Engineering.

patterns: Give me information about MECHANICAL Department
Can I know about Mechanical department?
What is the intake of mechanical Department?
When is mechanical department established?
responses: Department of Mechanical Engineering is one of the oldest departments established at the time of inception of the institute in the year 1995. The department currently offers an undergraduate program - B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering and two postgraduate programs - M.Tech. in Advanced Manufacturing Systems and M.Tech. in CAD/CAM. Department is also recognized as ‘Research Center’ by the JNTU Hyderabad for offering Ph.D. program.

patterns: Give me information about ECE Department
Can I know about ECE department?
What is the intake of ECE Department?
When is ECE department established?
responses: The Department of ECE was founded in 1995 and is recognized by JNTU Hyderabad as a centre for Research and Development activities. The research Centre is of internationally acclaimed standards, predominantly in the areas of Communications, Signal Processing, Microelectronics and IoT.Presently, the Department has an intake of 240 Students for UG programme and an intake of 18 students for PG programme

patterns: Give me information about CSE Department
Can I know about CSE department?
What is the intake of CSE Department?
responses: The department of computer science and engineering has a vibrant body of faculty with 73 in number (7 Professors, 9 Associate Professors and 57 Assistant Professors associated with the additional support of non-teaching and technical staff) intends to set the standards for the quality of education for approaching years.

patterns: Give me information about EIE Department
Can I know about EIE department?
What is the intake of EIE Department?
When is EIE department established?
responses: The B.Tech, Electronics and Instrumentation Engineering (EIE) was started during the academic year 1999-2000 with an intake of 60 and has been enhanced to 120 during the academic year 2011-2012. Furthermore, M.Tech in Electronics and Instrumentation (E & I) was started during the academic year 2010-2011 respectively with the approval of AICTE and affiliated to JNTUH.

patterns: Give me information about AE Department
Can I know about AE department?
What is the intake of AE Department?
When is AE department established?
responses: The department of automobile engineering commenced with an undergraduate programme in the year 2010. Keeping itself up-to-date with the latest developments in the field with a dedicated team of highly qualified and experienced faculty in various streams of automobile engineering.The department has an intake of 60 students for UG programme.

patterns: Give me information about H&S Department
Can I know about H&S department?
What is the intake of H&S Department?
When is H&S department established?
responses: The Humanities and Sciences Department started functioning right from the inception of the Institute in the year 1995. The Department comprises five disciplines namely, English, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Management Sciences.
